place.name: ST BOSWELLS
place.gazetteerText: Lessudden (or St Boswell's), vil., in par. and 1½ mile SE. of St Boswell's sta., NW. Roxburghshire, pop. 555; P.O., T.O., called St Boswell's; Lessudden House, an old Border house, is the seat of the Scotts of Raeburn. See ST BOSWELLS. (In 1887, John Bartholomew's Gazetteer of the British Isles)
